actionable_insights: Emphasize eco-tourism in marketing campaigns to leverage Guatemala's natural resources.
Highlight unique cultural experiences that set Guatemala apart from competitors in the region.
Create packages that combine well-known attractions with off-the-beaten-path tours to cater to diverse travel preferences.
key_insights: Travelers are increasingly interested in authentic experiences and eco-friendly options.
The rainy season presents opportunities for budget travel but requires strategic marketing to highlight benefits.
Investment in flight and accommodation partnerships could bolster competitive pricing during high-demand months.
